row.cell: P4 to P5 migration report and recommendations

cell.ref: Header record of possibly external metadata
Changing conten models in drama tags
extend and generalise names and dates
Element for indicating supplied letters for expansions
A new floating embedded text element
<roleDesc> should be allowed as child of <castGroup>

div.head: Appendix: Note on CDATA attributes
div.p:
There are very few left:
cRefPattern/@replacementPattern leave as is
state/@delim change to data.words
rhyme/label= change to data.word
those which will be addressed by resolving SF FR 1007355:
graph/@label - node/@label - arc/@label
tree/@label - root/@label - iNode/@label
leaf/@label - eTree/@label - triangle/@label
eLeaf/@label - node/@label2 - arc/@label
and those that will be addressed when we do name regularization
orgName/@reg
orgTitle/@reg
orgType/@reg
orgDivn/@reg
